experiences.title: Co-Founder and Head of Marketing
experiences.description: St Louis, Missouri, United States Stitching society together, one thread at a time.My role within Fabric involves a wide array of fields, from go-to-market strategy, front-end app development, brand vision, and organizational strategy. With a dedicated, driven, and talented team, we hope to take Fabric into the public eye with exponential growth.
